intro: Brachylaena ilicifolia, commonly known as the silver brachylaena, is a shrub native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its greyish, silver-green leaves that are covered in fine hairs. Brachylaena ilicifolia thrives in well-drained soils and is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments.
